ai-mil3.4.10:1.2_0: “A bull elephant who doesn’t know extinguishment as an happiness of extinguishment,”
ai-mil3.4.10:1.3_0: “Great king, one who doesn’t know extinguishment is the happiness of extinguishment.”
ai-mil3.4.10:1.4_0: “Sir, how does one know that the happiness of an elephant?”
ai-mil3.4.10:1.5_0: “What do you think, great king, wouldn’t you think ‘the hand’?”
ai-mil3.4.10:1.8_0: “Sir, after hearing these things, his hands and feet are cut off, thinking: ‘Hearing an end of suffering’?”
ai-mil3.4.10:1.9_0: “In the same way, when those who hear extinguishment sees extinguishment, they know that the noise are fully extinguished.”
ai-mil3.4.10:3.1_0: the tenth enlightenment of Emancipation, (wholesome) is the tenth thing,
ai-mil3.4.10:4.1_0: The fourth sub-chapter on quenching is finished.
ai-mil3.4.10:5.1_0: (In this way) he spoke the ten questions in accordance with the Teaching.
